titleStmt.title: A position and testimony against all swearing under the gospel In which may be seen, I. That Christ hath forbidden all sorts of oaths. II. What Christ hath substituted instead of an oath. III. Reasons for that prohibition and substitution. With an answer to all the material objections that are, or may be, alledged from the scriptures.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, fl. 1692.

titleStmt.title: A position and testimony against all swearing under the gospel In which may be seen, I. That Christ hath forbidden all sorts of oaths. II. What Christ hath substituted instead of an oath. III. Reasons for that prohibition and substitution. With an answer to all the material objections that are, or may be, alledged from the scriptures.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, fl. 1692.

notesStmt.note: To the reader signed: Philothrenes = John Fisher.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
